page.title: 01Location & shopping
page.content: Our area is south of the country town of Horncastle. The nearest big towns are Lincoln 21 miles away and Skegness 20 miles. The land and roads are very hilly and a car or motorbike is needed to get to shops etc. Although there is only one school in our area there are a lot of village schools round about that have about 100 pupils. We still have the 11 plus exam which pupils take in their primary school. If they get a high mark they can go to a grammar school otherwise they go to secondary moderns. Banovallum, the Roamn name for Horncastle is one of these. Just outside Horncastle there is a Spar shop with an adjoining garage. Spar is an independent trade organisation and our shop has been going for 4 years & employs 9 people. The main produce sold is groceries eg apples, potatoes, tinned food & sweets
